Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
bunsen \bunsen\ n. 1. same as {bunsen burner}; a gas burner used in laboratories; has an air valve to regulate the mixture of gas and air.
Syn: bunsen burner, etna. [WordNet 1.5]

Bunsen n 1: German chemist who with Kirchhoff pioneered spectrum analysis but is remembered mainly for his invention of the Bunsen burner (1811-1899) [syn: {Robert Bunsen}, {Robert Wilhelm Bunsen}] 2: a gas burner used in laboratories; has an air valve to regulate the mixture of gas and air [syn: {bunsen burner}, {etna}]
